data.title: Accurate Names of Law Schools
data.meta_description: Admissions, Consulting, and Preparation for Law School. Our mission is to help clients get admitted to their dream school.
data.text:
When referring to a school, you should make sure that you are using the names that they prefer to be called rather than what you may know them as colloquially. Also make sure that you are using the correct name – some are schools of law, some are law schools, while others are colleges of law. You don’t want to miss such details.

Here is a (likely incomplete) list of how the top 50-ish schools refer to themselves in their marketing materials:

1 - Yale Law School – YLS – Yale

2 - Stanford Law School– SLS – Stanford

3 - Harvard Law School – HLS - Harvard

4 - University of Chicago Law School – UChicago

5 - Columbia Law School – CLS – Columbia

6 - New York University School of Law - NYU

7 - University of Pennsylvania Law School – Penn

8 - University of Virginia School of Law – UVA Law - UVA

9 - University of Michigan Law School – Michigan Law - Michigan

10 - Duke University School of Law – Duke Law - Duke

10 - Northwestern Pritzker School of Law – Northwestern Law - Northwestern

10 - University of California, Berkeley, School of Law - Berkeley Law – (Note use to be Boalt Hall – but tries not to use that any more)

13 - Cornell Law School – Cornell Law - Cornell

14 - Georgetown Law – Georgetown – (Georgetown University Law Center – GULC – not used on website anymore)

15 - University of California, Los Angeles, School of Law – UCLA School of Law - UCLA Law - UCLA

16 - University of Texas at Austin School of Law - Texas Law (they prefer Texas Law over UT)

17 - University of Southern California Gould School of Law - USC Gould

18 - Vanderbilt Law School - Vanderbilt

18 - Washington University School of Law – WashULaw

20 - University of Minnesota Law School - Minnesota Law

21 - Notre Dame Law School – ND Law

22 - The George Washington University Law School – GW Law School – GW Law

23 - Boston University School of Law – BU Law

23 - University of California, Irvine, School of Law – UCI Law

25 - University of Alabama School of Law – Hugh F. Culverhouse School of Law – Culverhouse Law – Alabama Law

26 - Emory University School of Law - Emory Law

27 - Arizona State University Sandra Day O’Connor College of Law - ASU Law

27 - Boston College Law School - BC Law

27 - University of Georgia – UGA Law

27 - University of Iowa College of Law – Iowa Law

31 - University of California, Davis, School of Law – UC Davis School of Law – King Hall - UC Davis Law

31 - University of Florida Fredric G. Levin College of Law – UF Law

31 - Wake Forest University School of Law – Wake Forest Law

34 - Maurer School of Law at Indiana University Bloomington - Maurer School of Law – Indiana Law

34 - Moritz College of Law at The Ohio State University – OSU Law – Moritz

34 - University of North Carolina School of Law – UNC Law

34 - University of Wisconsin Law School – UW Law

34 - Washington and Lee University School of Law – W&L Law

39 - Brigham Young University J Reuben Clark Law School – BYU Law

39 - Fordham University School of Law – Fordham Law School – Fordham Law

39 - James E. Rogers College of Law at the University of Arizona - University of Arizona Law School – Arizona Law

39 - University of Illinois College of Law – UIllinois Law

39 - The Marshall-Wythe School of Law at the College of William & Mary - William & Mary Law School - William & Mary – W&M Law

44 - University of Washington School of Law – UW School of Law – UW Law

45 - Antonin Scalia Law School at George Mason University – Scalia Law

45 - University of Colorado Law School - Boulder – Colorado Law

47 - S. J Quinney College of Law at the University of Utah – Utah Law

48 - Baylor Law School – Baylor Law

48 - Florida State University College of Law – FSU Law

48 - Temple University Beasley School of Law – Temple Law School – Temple Law

53 - Benjamin N. Cardozo School of Law at Yeshiva University – Cardozo Law School – Cardozo Law
